T02D1556:208a-1: sh'ri badzra yo gi n'i ho ma bi dhi /
T02D1556:208a-3: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sbyin sreg gi cho
T02D1556:208a-4: ga / dpal rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal
T02D1556:208a-5: lo // dang por re zhig dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i bzhed pas 'jig rten dang //
T02D1556:208a-6: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las kyi tshogs dang /
T02D1556:208a-7: dngos grub bsgrub pa'i don du sbyin sreg gi bya ba byed par 'dod pa'i sngags pas /
T02D1556:208a-8: gru gsum pa'i rnam pa can gyi thab khung gi
T02D1556:208a-9: rgya khyon gyi phyed thur du brkos pa phyi skor
T02D1556:208a-10: dang bcas pa dmar ba la sogs pa'i mdog dang
T02D1556:208a-11: ldan pa legs par 'chos pa byas la //
T02D1556:208a-12: nub la sogs par bltas pa'i tshul gyis 'dug la /
T02D1556:208a-13: mchod pa'i yo byad ldas mchod de thab khung du
T02D1556:208a-14: bsreg cing bkod nas yi ge ram gyi sa bon
T02D1556:208a-15: las skyes pa'i mo lha mdog dmar po ril ba
T02D1556:208a-16: spyi blugs dang / mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang /
T02D1556:208a-18: bgrang phreng lag na 'dzin pa rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1556:208a-19: de nas ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa la sogs pa byas nas ni //
T02D1556:208b-0: de'i lce'i rtse mor ram bkod nas @208b bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'i rdzas dang /
T02D1556:208b-1: 'jig rten pa'i rdzas rnams aom aagne de ba t'a s'va h'a //
T02D1556:208b-2: zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis sbyin sreg byas nas sngags de nyid kyis dgang blugs dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1556:208b-3: de nas de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid kyi sngags kyis me lha'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02D1556:208b-4: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo lhag par mos par byas nas mchod pa la sogs pa byas te //
T02D1556:208b-5: bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams kyis lha ma'am lha rnams la sngags kyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1556:208b-6: zhi la bsreg rdzas mar sogs te /
T02D1556:208b-7: rgyas pa la ni mngar nyid do //
T02D1556:208b-8: dbang la mar dang lan tshva nyid //
T02D1556:208b-9: drag po tsha dang kha sogs kyis //
T02D1556:208b-10: zhi la gzugs ni dkar po ste //
T02D1556:208b-11: rgyas pa la ni ser po bsgom //
T02D1556:208b-12: dbang la dmar po zhes byar brjod //
T02D1556:208b-13: drag po nag por rab tu grags //
T02D1556:208b-14: dngos grub sgrub pa'i dus su ni //
T02D1556:208b-15: kha dog dmar por rnam par bsgom //
T02D1556:208b-16: de ltar byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rang gi lus la bcug nas //
T02D1556:208b-17: gtor ma btang ste tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i tshul du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchod pa byas nas /
T02D1556:208b-18: rang mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub zhu bar bya'o //
T02D1556:208b-19: bstan par bya min sbyin sreg 'di //
T02D1556:208b-20: rab tu 'bad pas sba bar bya //
T02D1556:208b-21: de nas dngos grub skye 'gyur gyi //
T02D1556:208b-22: gzhan du grub la brten mi 'gyur //
T02D1556:208b-23: yang dag dad pas rjes sbyar ba //
T02D1556:208b-24: yid bzhin nor bu lta bu'i sngags //
T02D1556:208b-25: phyag rgya chen po'i 'dod pa yi //
T02D1556:208b-26: dad ldan rnams la bstan par bya //
T02D1556:208b-27: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i bzhed pa las /
T02D1556:208b-28: gsang ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga slob dpon chen
T02D1556:208b-29: po bsod snyoms pa'i slob ma rgyal bas byin gyi
T02D1556:208b-30: tsha bo sangs rgyas byin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
T02D1556:208b-32: / // / bal po'i pandi ta bha rendra ru tsi dang //
T02D1556:208b-33: bod kyi lo ts'a ba blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o /
